mosinstall.name: Content Page
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This shows a single content page

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: section
param.label: Section Name
param.description: Show/Hide the Section the item belongs to

param.name: section_link
param.label: Section Name Linkable
param.description: Make the Section text a link to the actual section page

param.name: category
param.label: Category Name
param.description: Show/Hide the Category the item belongs to

param.name: category_link
param.label: Category Name Linkable
param.description: Make the Category text a link to the actual Category page

param.name: rating
param.label: Item Rating
param.description: Show/Hide the item rating - only affects this page

param.name: author
param.label: Author Names
param.description: Show/Hide the item author - only affects this page

param.name: createdate
param.label: Created Date and Time
param.description: Show/Hide the item creation date - only affects this page

param.name: modifydate
param.label: Modified Date and Time
param.description: Show/Hide the item modification date - only affects this page

param.name: pdf
param.label: PDF Icon
param.description: Show/Hide the item pdf button - only affects this page

param.name: print
param.label: Print Icon
param.description: Show/Hide the item print button - only affects this page

param.name: email
param.label: Email Icon
param.description: Show/Hide the item email button - only affects this page

param.name: keyref
param.label: Key Reference
param.description: A text key that an item may be referenced by (like a help reference)

param.name: docbook_type
param.label: DocBook Type
param.description: Associates a type of DocBook document with this content item (Note: experimental, not for production).
